description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任北京市政协副主席、北京人民艺术剧院院长、党委副书记、第十二届全国人民代表大会北京地区代表。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, who served as Vice Chairman of the Beijing Municipal Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, President and Deputy Party Secretary of the Beijing People's Art Theatre, and a delegate from Beijing to the 12th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家，是中国共产党领导的政权。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia, it is the regime led by the Chinese Communist Party.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议北京市委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议北京市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议在北京市的地方组织。
description.en: The local organization of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference in Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 中国著名的话剧院。
description.en: A renowned drama theatre in China.

nodes.id: 第十二届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第十二届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第十二届国家最高权力机关。
description.en: The 12th term of the highest state authority of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于北京的一所戏剧专业学校。
description.en: A drama vocational school located in Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议第十一届全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议第十一届全国委员会
en: 11th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议的第十一届全国委员会。
description.en: The 11th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 中国河北省衡水市下辖的县级市。
description.en: A county-level city under the jurisdiction of Hengshui City, Hebei Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 由中国电影家组成的群众性团体，是中国文学艺术界联合会的团体会员。
description.en: A mass organization composed of Chinese filmmakers, and a group member of the China Federation of Literary and Art Circles.

nodes.id: 中国文学艺术界联合会

zh-cn: 中国文学艺术界联合会
en: China Federation of Literary and Art Circles

description.zh-cn: 由中华人民共和国全国性的文学艺术家协会、各省、自治区、直辖市的文学艺术界联合会和全国性的产业文学艺术工作者联合会组成的人民团体。
description.en: A people's organization composed of national associations of literary and art workers of the People's Republic of China, federations of literary and art circles of provinces, autonomous regions, and municipalities directly under the Central Government, and national federations of industrial literary and art workers.

nodes.id: 中国共产党北京市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党北京市委员会
en: Beijing Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在北京市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Beijing.

nodes.id: 全国人民代表大会教育科学文化卫生委员会

zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会教育科学文化卫生委员会
全国人大教科文卫委员会
en: Education, Science, Culture and Public Health Committee of the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会的专门委员会之一。
description.en: One of the special committees of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 张和平是河北深州人。
description.en: Zhang Heping is from Shenzhou, Hebei.

description.zh-cn: 张和平是中华人民共和国的政治人物。
description.en: Zhang Heping is a politician of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议北京市委员会

description.zh-cn: 张和平曾任北京市政协副主席。
description.en: Zhang Heping served as Vice Chairman of the Beijing Municipal Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 张和平于2007年至2014年担任北京人民艺术剧院院长。
description.en: Zhang Heping served as the President of the Beijing People's Art Theatre from 2007 to 2014.

description.zh-cn: 张和平曾任北京人民艺术剧院党委副书记。
description.en: Zhang Heping served as the Deputy Party Secretary of the Beijing People's Art Theatre.

relationships.target: 第十二届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 张和平是第十二届全国人民代表大会北京地区代表。
description.en: Zhang Heping was a delegate from the Beijing region to the 12th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 张和平毕业于北京戏剧专科学校话剧表演专业。
description.en: Zhang Heping graduated from the Beijing Drama College with a major in drama performance.

description.zh-cn: 张和平于1977年加入中国共产党。
description.en: Zhang Heping joined the Communist Party of China in 1977.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议第十一届全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 2008年，张和平当选第十一届全国政协委员。
description.en: In 2008, Zhang Heping was elected as a member of the 11th National Committee of the CPPCC.

position.zh-cn: 第六届、第七届理事会理事

description.zh-cn: 张和平曾任中国电影家协会第六届（2003-2008）和第七届（2008-2018）理事会理事。
description.en: Zhang Heping served as a member of the 6th (2003-2008) and 7th (2008-2018) Councils of the China Film Association.

relationships.target: 中国文学艺术界联合会

position.zh-cn: 第九届、第十届全国委员会委员
position.en: Member of the 9th and 10th National Committee

description.zh-cn: 张和平曾任中国文学艺术界联合会第九届（2011-2016）和第十届（2016-2021）全国委员会委员。
description.en: Zhang Heping served as a member of the 9th (2011-2016) and 10th (2016-2021) National Committees of the China Federation of Literary and Art Circles.

relationships.target: 中国共产党北京市委员会

description.zh-cn: 张和平是中共北京市委委员。
description.en: Zhang Heping is a member of the Beijing Municipal Committee of the CCP.

relationships.target: 全国人民代表大会教育科学文化卫生委员会

description.zh-cn: 张和平是全国人大教科文卫委员会委员。
description.en: Zhang Heping is a member of the Education, Science, Culture and Public Health Committee of the National People's Congress.
